description: Program to apply a multi-threshold (mthresh) dataset to an input dataset.

mthresh_file.title: Multi-threshold File
mthresh_file.description: Multi-threshold dataset from 3dXClustSim, usually via running '3dttest++ -ETAC'.

signed_flag.title: Signed Flag
signed_flag.description: Indicates if the .mthresh.nii file from 3dXClustSim was created using 1-sided thresholding. Choose sign + or -.

prefix.title: Output Prefix
prefix.description: Prefix for output dataset. Can be 'NULL' to get no output dataset.

mask_only_flag.title: Mask Only Flag
mask_only_flag.description: Instead of outputting a thresholded version of the input dataset, just output a 0/1 mask dataset of voxels that survive the process.

all_mask.title: All Mask Prefix
all_mask.description: Write out a multi-volume dataset with prefix 'qqq' where each volume is the binary mask of voxels that pass ONE of the tests.

no_zero_flag.title: No Zero Flag
no_zero_flag.description: Prevents the output of a dataset if it would be all zero.
